p: T CD8 play a pivotal part in clearing IAV infections. Na√Øve IAV-specific T CD8 are primed by professional antigen (Ag)-presenting cells (APCs) displaying cognate peptide:MHC I complexes along with costimulatory signals [ 14]. They then proliferate and differentiate into fully armed cytotoxic T lymphocytes (CTLs) that utilize cytolytic effector molecules ( e. g., perforin and granzymes) to destroy infected cells as well as inflammatory cytokines that limit viral replication and transmission [ 15].
